channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 21 Best iPhone 17 Cases and Accessories (2025)
item.description: Protect your expensive iPhone 17, iPhone Air, or Pro iPhone with our favorite cases and screen protectors.

item.title: Onton raises $7.5M to expand its AI-powered shopping site beyond furniture
item.description: Onton, which change its name from Deft, is giving users an infinite canvas with AI-powered image generation to nudge them towards making quicker purch...

item.title: Uber and WeRide’s robotaxi service in Abu Dhabi is officially driverless
item.description: The commercial robotaxi service launched last year. Now, the human safety operator is gone.

item.title: The 11 Best Cooling Mattresses for Hot Sleepers (2025)
item.description: Nothing ruins a great night of sleep faster than getting too hot. We slept on a myriad of cooling mattresses to find which ones drew the heat away bes...

item.title: 12 Best Computer Monitors (2025): Budget, OLED, 4K, and More
item.description: The Gear team spends countless hours in front of displays while writing for you. So we reviewed those too (including a portable screen).

item.title: Bug in jury systems used by several US states exposed sensitive personal data
item.description: An easy-to-exploit vulnerability in a jury system made by Tyler Technologies exposed the personally identifiable data of jurors, including names, home...

item.title: 14 Best Tablets (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We’ve tested all the top slates, from Apple’s iPads to Android and Windows devices, and rounded up our favorites.

item.title: The Best Star Wars Gifts for Everyone, From Padawans to Jedi Masters (2025)
item.description: These are the best Star Wars gifts in the galaxy for everyone, from Padawan fans to Jedi masters.

item.title: Why ‘hold forever’ investors are snapping up venture capital ‘zombies’
item.description: An investor explains the "buy, fix, and hold" model employed by Bending Spoons and similar companies that buy distressed startups.

item.title: YouTube is working on a feature that will fix the messy home feed
item.description: YouTube is experimenting with a new feature that allows users to customize their home feed.
